attacks.phishing.tools package

Submodules

attacks.phishing.tools.attack module

attacks.phishing.tools.attack.initialize_attack(phishing_id: str)[source]

Function to initialize a phishing attack.

Retrieves the phishing model corresponding to the provided ID, constructs the message body and URL, and sends the phishing message to the target.

Parameters: - phishing_id: ID of the phishing model.

Returns: - Function: Function to send phishing message to a target.

attacks.phishing.tools.attack.send_msg(target: str, body: str)[source]

Function to send a message using Twilio.

Parameters: - target: Phone number of the recipient. - body: Body of the message.

Returns: - None

Function to initialize a phishing attack.
